AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Luis, Potosi, Mexico: starting point of the undocumented aliens' journey
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: destination country of the undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: intended destination within the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: location where the group purchased supplies and crossed the river
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande River: border crossing point between Mexico and the United States
